locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Displays all supporters of Language Science Press

The people listed below are supporters of Language Science Press. If you want to join as well, register with Language Science Press and choose the appropriate option.

You may also support us by joining us on academia.edu. Currently the academia list has supporters partly different from the ones listed below.
The following users are currently ranked as promiment:
Enter a user name to add it to the prominent list.
Enter a user name to remove it from the prominent list.
